about_the_game:
Awesome Street Skaters is a gritty skateboarding action-management game. Grab your skateboard and challenge your neighborhood skaters. Travel the world and compete against the best. Prove yourself and rise up to the World Championship.

Take part in quests and challenges. Learn new tricks, design the coolest skateboard and dress up like a star. Buy or get these customizations. Challenge the world in leagues and showcase your trophies and unlock new tournaments. Discover deep movement variety, balanced character development and trick racing composition. Strive to be the best by improving your team and yourself.

Main Features



Go to characters and places waiting to be discovered. Journey towards rivals and new countries. Ride your skateboard around the world's most beautiful cities. Be popular all over the world. Enjoy the eccentric maps and flow.

Try to do the coolest moves based on your character development. We have designed challenging sections in pure entertainment without overwhelming you with numbers. Think you're good enough? So grab your skateboard and challenge the masters waiting to take on the challenge. Become the owner of numerous achievements and trophies. Put your name on the best.

Awesome Street Skaters is a gritty skateboarding action-management game. Grab your skateboard and challenge your neighborhood skaters. Travel the world and compete against the best. Prove yourself and rise up to the World Championship.

Challenge the world in leagues and showcase your trophies and unlock new tournaments. Discover deep movement variety, balanced character development and trick racing composition. Strive to be the best by improving your team and yourself.

Main Features



Go to characters and places waiting to be discovered. Journey towards rivals and new countries. Ride your skateboard around the world's most beautiful cities. Be popular all over the world. Enjoy the eccentric maps and flow.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 or AMD FX-6300 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 or AMD R9 270
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770 or AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD R9 290X
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Awesome Street Skaters is a gritty skateboarding action-management game. Grab your skateboard and challenge your neighborhood skaters. Travel the world and compete against the best. Prove yourself and rise up to the World Championship.
supported_languages:
English*, German*, Russian*, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support
